Title: Expands the residential health care for children with medical fragility in transition to young adults and young adults with medical fragility demonstration program
Summary: Expands the residential health care for children with medical fragility in transition to young adults and young adults with medical fragility demonstration program to include certain eligible residential facilities in addition to pediatric residential health care facilities authorized to participate in such program.
LawCode: Amd ยง2808-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to expanding the young adults with medical fragility demonstration program
